TEXT.TITLE: WILSON FOODS CORP <WILF> 2ND QTR JAN 31 NET
TEXT.BODY: Oper shr profit 21 cts vs loss 55 cts Oper net profit 1,528,000 vs loss 3,296,000 Sales 329.4 mln vs 368.0 mln 1st half Oper shr profit 28 cts vs loss 4.55 dlrs Oper net profit 2,026,000 vs loss 27.3 mln Sales 691.3 mln vs 738.2 mln NOTE: Prior half net includes pretax charge 21.4 mln dlrs from plant closings and workforce reductions. Current year net excludes tax credits of 1,381,000 dlrs in quarter and 1,722,000 dlrs in half. Reuter
